not_covered.label: Not covered by the Produce Safety Rule
not_covered.summary: Based on your answers, this farm is not covered by the Produce Safety Rule.

rarely_consumed_raw.label: Commodity not covered (rarely consumed raw)
rarely_consumed_raw.summary: The specific commodity you asked about is not covered because it is rarely consumed raw.

personal_consumption.label: Produce not covered (personal/on-farm consumption)
personal_consumption.summary: Produce intended for personal or on-farm consumption is not covered.

processing_exemption.label: Eligible for exemption (commercial processing with an adequate kill step)
processing_exemption.summary: This produce is eligible for an exemption when it is destined for commercial processing that adequately reduces pathogens.
reminderItems: Keep statements in documents accompanying the produce.
Obtain written assurances from the processor.
Maintain documentation or records required by the rule.

qualified_exemption.label: Eligible for a qualified exemption
qualified_exemption.summary: Based on your answers, the farm may qualify for a qualified exemption under the Produce Safety Rule.
reminderItems: Maintain required documentation and records supporting the exemption.

covered.label: YOU ARE COVERED BY THIS RULE.
covered.summary: Based on your answers, the farm is covered by the Produce Safety Rule.

intro.title: Am I covered by the FSMA Produce Safety Rule?
body: Answer a few questions to determine whether the Produce Safety Rule (21 CFR Part 112) applies to your farm or produce commodity.
This tool uses your responses only in your browser. It does not store or send data.

q1.title: Question 1
q1.prompt: Does your farm grow, harvest, pack, or hold produce?

q2.title: Question 2
q2.prompt: On average over the previous 3 years, are your annual produce sales $25,000 or less?
q2.helperText: Use gross sales averages over the previous 3 years.

q3.title: Question 3
q3.prompt: Is the produce commodity you're asking about rarely consumed raw?

q3_helper.title: Not sure if it is rarely consumed raw?
body: FDA identifies certain commodities as "rarely consumed raw."
Check the FDA list, or continue if you are unsure and want to proceed with the rest of the questions.

q4.title: Question 4
q4.prompt: Is this produce for personal or on-farm consumption?

q5.title: Question 5
q5.prompt: Is this produce intended for commercial processing that adequately reduces pathogens (a "kill step")?

q5_helper.title: Not sure about commercial processing?
body: Commercial processing with a kill step means a validated process that adequately reduces pathogens.
Examples can include thermal processing, pasteurization, or other validated pathogen-reduction steps.

q6.title: Question 6
q6.prompt: On average over the previous 3 years, does your farm have BOTH: (1) less than $500,000 in annual food sales, AND (2) a majority of food sales (by value) sold directly to qualified end users?

q6_helper.title: Qualified end users (high level)
body: A qualified end user is a consumer of the food, OR a restaurant or retail food establishment located in the same State (or same Indian reservation) as the farm, OR within 275 miles of the farm.
If you are unsure, you can select a provisional result and revisit after confirming your sales and buyer details.
